title: Sols 4500-4501: Bedrock With a Side of Sand

summary: From the mountains of Turin to the deserts of Arizona, a core element of Gateway, humanity’s first lunar space station, is now one step closer to the Moon. title: Axiom Space to launch orbital data centers on Kepler satellites
summary:
